metadata.title: CVE-2021-30531 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Content Security Policy in Google Chromeprior to 91.0.4472.77 allowed a remote attacker to bypass content securitypolicy via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
